typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct PQ storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)
function (struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,address) view returns (uint256)
function (struct MaxPQ storage pointer,struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,uint16,uint256)

documentation.text:
@notice Insert the validator address into this PQ.
 NOTE that caller should ensure the valdiator is not already in the queue.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct PQ storage pointer,struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,uint16) view returns (uint256)
function (struct MaxPQ storage pointer,struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,uint16,uint256)

documentation.text:
@notice Pop the minimal value in the priority queue.
 NOTE that caller should ensure the queue is not empty!

documentation.text:
@notice Reheapify the heap when the validator is deleted.
 NOTE that caller should ensure the queue is not empty.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct PQ storage pointer,address) view returns (uint16)
function (struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,address) view returns (uint256)
function (struct MaxPQ storage pointer,struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,uint16,uint256)

documentation.text:
@notice Reheapify the heap when the collateral of a key has increased.
 NOTE that caller should ensure the queue is not empty.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct PQ storage pointer,address) view returns (uint16)
function (struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,address) view returns (uint256)
function (struct MaxPQ storage pointer,struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,uint16,uint256)

documentation.text:
@notice Reheapify the heap when the collateral of a key has decreased.
 NOTE that caller should ensure the queue is not empty.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,address) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text:
@notice Get the maximum value in the priority queue.
 NOTE that caller should ensure the queue is not empty!

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct PQ storage pointer,struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,uint16) view returns (uint256)
function (struct PQ storage pointer,struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,uint16) view returns (uint256)
function (struct MaxPQ storage pointer,struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,uint16,uint16) view returns (uint16,uint256)
function (struct PQ storage pointer,struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,uint16) view returns (uint256)
function (struct PQ storage pointer,struct ValidatorSet storage pointer,uint16) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text: @notice Get the larger index of pos1 and pos2.

The max index priority queue for staking. The same implementation as LibMinPQ, just order compare
 is reversed.
